scripts.deploy:mumbai: npm run build:mumbai && graph deploy --product hosted-service fuul-protocol/mumbai
scripts.deploy:goerli: npm run build:goerli && graph deploy --product hosted-service fuul-protocol/goerli
scripts.deploy:polygon: npm run build:polygon && graph deploy --product hosted-service fuul-protocol/polygon
scripts.deploy:base: npm run build:base && graph deploy --product hosted-service fuul-protocol/base
scripts.deploy:optimism: npm run build:optimism && graph deploy --product hosted-service fuul-protocol/optimism
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: npm run build:arbitrum && graph deploy --product hosted-service fuul-protocol/arbitrum
scripts.deploy:bsc: npm run build:bsc && graph deploy --studio fuul-protocol-bsc
scripts.deploy:base-sepolia: npm run build:base-sepolia && graph deploy --studio fuul-protocol-base-sepolia
scripts.deploy:zksync-era: npm run build:zksync-era && graph deploy --studio fuul-protocol-zksync-era

scripts.deploy:monad-testnet: npm run build:monad-testnet && graph deploy monad-testnet --deploy-key 1eH3sXc34rcKb --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz
